CommonTextAddition.footerDescText: Free AI vibe coding assistant - get help with programming, debugging, and development!
CommonTextAddition.inputTipText: Describe your coding problem, include relevant code snippets for better assistance.
CommonTextAddition.inputTipText2: Code solutions are publicly displayed and indexed by search engines.

CommonTextAddition.securityVerificationError: Security verification error. Please refresh and try again.
CommonTextAddition.aboutDescription: Vibe Coding is an AI-powered coding assistant designed to help developers write better code, debug issues, and learn new programming concepts. Our platform provides instant, intelligent responses to your coding questions.
CommonTextAddition.feature1Description: Generate code snippets, functions, and complete solutions using advanced AI technology.
CommonTextAddition.feature2Description: Get help with Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, and many other programming languages.
CommonTextAddition.feature3Description: Identify and fix bugs in your code with intelligent error analysis and suggestions.
CommonTextAddition.feature4Description: Access explanations, tutorials, and best practices to improve your coding skills.
CommonTextAddition.faq1Question: What programming languages does Vibe Coding support?
CommonTextAddition.faq1Answer: Vibe Coding supports all major programming languages including Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, C++, C#, Go, Rust, PHP, Ruby, and many more.
CommonTextAddition.faq2Question: Is Vibe Coding free to use?
CommonTextAddition.faq2Answer: Yes, Vibe Coding offers free access to our AI coding assistant. You can ask questions and get code help without any cost.
CommonTextAddition.faq3Question: How accurate are the AI-generated code solutions?
CommonTextAddition.faq3Answer: Our AI provides highly accurate solutions based on best practices and current programming standards. However, we recommend reviewing and testing all generated code before using it in production.
CommonTextAddition.faq4Question: Can I use Vibe Coding for learning programming?
CommonTextAddition.faq4Answer: Absolutely! Vibe Coding is perfect for beginners and experienced developers alike. We provide detailed explanations and educational content alongside code solutions.
CommonTextAddition.faq5Question: Is my code and data secure?
CommonTextAddition.faq5Answer: Yes, we take security seriously. All communications are encrypted, and we follow industry best practices to protect your data and code.

PrivacyPolicyText.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicyText.description: Privacy Policy for Vibe Coding - AI Coding Assistant
PrivacyPolicyText.detailText:
# Privacy Policy for Vibe Coding

**Effective Date:** January 1, 2025

## 1. Introduction

Welcome to Vibe Coding, an AI-powered coding assistant platform. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.

## 2. Information We Collect

### 2.1 Personal Information
- **Account Information:** When you create an account, we collect your email address and username.
- **Profile Information:** Any additional information you choose to provide in your profile.

### 2.2 Usage Information
- **Code Queries:** The coding questions and problems you submit to our AI assistant.
- **Interaction Data:** How you interact with our platform, including features used and time spent.
- **Technical Data:** IP address, browser type, device information, and operating system.

### 2.3 Cookies and Tracking
We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze platform usage.

## 3. How We Use Your Information

### 3.1 Service Provision
- Provide AI coding assistance and generate responses to your queries
- Maintain and improve our platform functionality
- Personalize your coding experience

### 3.2 Communication
- Send service-related notifications and updates
- Respond to your inquiries and support requests

### 3.3 Analytics and Improvement
- Analyze usage patterns to improve our AI models
- Enhance platform performance and user experience

## 4. Information Sharing

### 4.1 Public Content
- Code solutions and discussions may be publicly visible on our platform
- You can control the visibility of your contributions through privacy settings

### 4.2 Third-Party Services
- We may share anonymized data with AI model providers to improve service quality
- We do not sell your personal information to third parties

### 4.3 Legal Requirements
We may disclose information when required by law or to protect our rights and users' safety.

## 5. Data Security

We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:
- Encryption of data in transit and at rest
- Regular security audits and updates
- Access controls and authentication measures

## 6. Your Rights

### 6.1 Access and Control
- View and update your account information
- Delete your account and associated data
- Control privacy settings for your contributions

### 6.2 Data Portability
- Request a copy of your data in a portable format
- Transfer your data to other services where technically feasible

## 7. Data Retention

- Account information is retained while your account is active
- Code queries and solutions may be retained to improve our AI models
- You can request deletion of specific data through your account settings

## 8. International Data Transfers

Your information may be processed in countries other than your residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international transfers.

## 9. Children's Privacy

Our service is not intended for users under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

## 10. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes through our platform or via email.

## 11. Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:

**Email:**  dongshan1025@gmail.com


Last updated: January 1, 2025

TermsOfServiceText.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfServiceText.description: Terms of Service for Vibe Coding - AI Coding Assistant
TermsOfServiceText.detailText:
# Terms of Service for Vibe Coding

**Effective Date:** January 1, 2025

## 1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using Vibe Coding ("the Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Service.

## 2. Description of Service

Vibe Coding is an AI-powered coding assistant platform that provides:
- Code generation and debugging assistance
- Programming tutorials and explanations
- Code review and optimization suggestions
- Community-driven coding solutions

## 3. User Accounts

### 3.1 Account Creation
- You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
- You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
- You must be at least 13 years old to create an account

### 3.2 Account Responsibility
- You are solely responsible for all activities under your account
- Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
- We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms

## 4. Acceptable Use

### 4.1 Permitted Uses
- Use the Service for legitimate coding and programming purposes
- Share code solutions and participate in community discussions
- Learn and improve your programming skills

### 4.2 Prohibited Uses
You may not:
- Use the Service for illegal activities or malicious code development
- Attempt to reverse engineer or compromise our AI models
- Spam, harass, or abuse other users
- Violate intellectual property rights
- Share sensitive or confidential information
- Use automated tools to scrape or abuse the Service

## 5. Content and Intellectual Property

### 5.1 Your Content
- You retain ownership of code and content you submit
- By submitting content, you grant us a license to use it to provide and improve our Service
- You represent that you have the right to share any content you submit

### 5.2 AI-Generated Content
- AI-generated responses are provided "as is" without warranties
- You are responsible for reviewing and validating AI-generated code
- We do not claim ownership of AI-generated content, but usage is subject to these Terms

### 5.3 Platform Content
- Our platform, including design, features, and AI models, is protected by intellectual property laws
- You may not copy, modify, or distribute our proprietary technology

## 6. Privacy and Data

### 6.1 Data Collection
- We collect and use your information as described in our Privacy Policy
- Code queries and solutions may be used to improve our AI models
- You can control the visibility of your contributions

### 6.2 Public Content
- Content you mark as public may be visible to other users and search engines
- Be cautious about sharing sensitive or proprietary code

## 7. Service Availability

### 7.1 Uptime
- We strive to maintain high service availability but do not guarantee 100% uptime
- Scheduled maintenance will be announced in advance when possible

### 7.2 Service Modifications
- We may modify, suspend, or discontinue features at any time
- We will provide reasonable notice for significant changes

## 8. Limitation of Liability

### 8.1 Disclaimer
- The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind
- We do not guarantee the accuracy or reliability of AI-generated content
- Use AI-generated code at your own risk and always review before implementation

### 8.2 Liability Limits
- Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law
- We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
- Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the Service

## 9. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from claims arising from:
- Your use of the Service
- Your violation of these Terms
- Your infringement of third-party rights

## 10. Termination

### 10.1 Termination by You
- You may terminate your account at any time through account settings
- Termination does not relieve you of obligations incurred before termination

### 10.2 Termination by Us
- We may terminate or suspend your account for violations of these Terms
- We may terminate the Service with reasonable notice

## 11. Governing Law

These Terms are governed by the laws of [Your Jurisdiction]. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of [Your Jurisdiction].

## 12. Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms periodically. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

## 13. Contact Information

For questions about these Terms, contact us at:

**Email:**  dongshan1025@gmail.com


## 14. Severability

If any provision of these Terms is found unenforceable, the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect.

Last updated: January 1, 2025
